function.name: SetMember
function.comment: set a member of a struct or union

function.name: GetMember
function.comment: get a member of a struct or union

function.name: SetDeref
function.comment: set the value at a pointer's address

function.name: GetDeref
function.comment: get the value stored at a pointer's address

function.name: SetIndexDeref
function.comment: set the value of an array at position 'index'

function.name: GetIndexDeref
function.comment: get the value of an array at position 'index'

function.name: Rte_Call(.*)
function.comment: Call of operation at client/server port

function.name: Rte_Prm(.*)
function.comment: The Rte_Prm API provides access to calibration data within calibration components.

function.name: Rte_CData(.*)
function.comment: The Rte_CData API provides access to per-instance and shared calibration parameters declared within a software component.

function.name: Rte_Enter(.*)
function.comment: The Rte_Enter API call is invoked by an application software component to define the start of an exclusive area.

function.name: Rte_Exit(.*)
function.comment: The Rte_Exit API call is invoked by an application software component to define the end of an exclusive area.

function.name: Rte_IFeedback(.*)
function.comment: The Rte_IFeedback API call provides access to transmission acknowledgement notifications for a sender-receiver communication.

function.name: Rte_IRead(.*)
function.comment: Perform an implicit read on a sender-receiver communication using non-queued semantics.

function.name: Rte_IWrite(.*)
function.comment: Perform an implicit write on a sender-receiver communication using “data” semantics.

function.name: Rte_IWriteRef(.*)
function.comment: Access a reference to the RTE manager buffer used for implicit writes on a senderreceiver communication using “data” semantics.

function.name: Rte_IrvIRead(.*)
function.comment: Provide read access to an inter-runnable variable with an IMPLICIT communication approach.

function.name: Rte_IrvIWrite(.*)
function.comment: Provide write access to an inter-runnable variable.

function.name: Rte_IrvRead(.*)
function.comment: Provide read access to an inter-runnable variable with an EXPLICIT communication approach.

function.name: Rte_IrvWrite(.*)
function.comment: Provide write access to an inter-runnable variable with an EXPLICIT communication approach.

function.name: Rte_Read(.*)
function.comment: Perform an explicit read on a sender-receiver communication using “data” semantics.

function.name: Rte_DRead(.*)
function.comment: Perform an explicit read on a sender-receiver communication using “data” semantics.

function.name: Rte_Receive(.*)
function.comment: Perform an explicit read on a sender-receiver communication using “event” semantics.

function.name: Rte_Pim(.*)
function.comment: AUTOSAR Per-Instance Memory Access

function.name: Rte_Result(.*)
function.comment: Description: Trigger the execution for all runnables whose ExternalTriggerOccurredEvent is associated with the trigger.

function.name: Rte_Send(.*)
function.comment: Description: Rte_Write initiates sender-receiver communication using “QUEUED” semantics.

function.name: Rte_Start(.*)
function.comment: Description: This function is invoked (typically by the ECU state manager or possibly by user code) to start the RTE.

function.name: Rte_Stop(.*)
function.comment: Description: This function is invoked (typically by the ECU state manager or possibly by user code) to stop the RTE.

function.name: Rte_Switch(.*)
function.comment: Description: Initiates a mode switch transition within a “mode graph”.

function.name: Rte_Tick_Timeouts(.*)
function.comment: Description: Rte_Tick_Timeouts ticks the Rte_Tout_Counter and sets any necessary OS events when alarms expire.

function.name: Rte_Trigger(.*)
function.comment: Description: Trigger the execution for all runnables whose ExternalTriggerOccurredEvent is associated with the trigger.

function.name: Rte_IrTrigger(.*)
function.comment: Description: Trigger the execution for all runnables whose InternalTriggerOccurredEvent is associated with the trigger.

function.name: Rte_Write(.*)
function.comment: Description: Rte_Write initiates sender-receiver communication using “UNQUEUED” semantics.

function.name: LED_OFF
function.comment: LED Icon

function.name: LED_ON
function.comment: LED Icon

function.name: LED_TEST
function.comment: LED Icon
